mapper.insert: insert into user(id, username, email, password, create_date, last_login_date, roles) values (null, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{createDate}, #{lastLoginDate}, #{roles})
mapper.select: select id, username, email, password, create_date, last_login_date, roles, enabled from user where username = #{username}
